subject: Basketball
Philanthropy
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Instead of pounding home a message about percentages of B.R.I. (Basketball Related Income), length of contracts or a hard salary cap, players tried to let fun and good vibrations rule the day.
snippet: Instead of pounding home a message about percentages of B.R.I. (Basketball Related Income), length of contracts or a hard salary cap, players tried to let fun and good vibrations rule the day.
